metadata.name: Portrait of Princess Marie Gabrielle Lobkowicz
metadata.description:
Portrait of Princess Marie Gabrielle Lobkowicz (1793–1863)

Proof of Patronage: The sale of this NFT directly funds the restoration of the Portrait of Princess Marie Gabrielle Lobkowicz. Patrons get access to a second NFT depicting the restored painting upon its completion. A patron of this project will see the portrait’s transformation from pre- to post-restoration, while still owning the only existing NFT of the work in its damaged condition.

Disclaimer: The NFT and the physical painting are separate works. Ownership of the NFT does not grant ownership of the physical work.
